title: Mobile App-Based Education for Queer History Learning with Sentiment Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of History Education and Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: Blended learning utilizing multimedia content in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can recognize and analyze emotional changes while exploring queer history-related content.
Learners can accurately explain major historical events and concepts with over 80% accuracy via mobile app-based formative assessments (quizzes).
Learners can recognize negative emotions (anger, anxiety, etc.) arising during learning and apply strategies to convert them into motivational drivers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
